Package io.senseai.kelvinsdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KelvinInit.ConnectionCallbacks
    Interface used to facilitate asynchronous communication about the connection status of the SDK.
    KelvinInit.ControlCallbacks
    Interface that is used to facilitate asynchronous communication between the SDK and client app.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KelvinErrorWakefulBroadcastReceiver
    Abstract class that can be extended to receive error broadcasts from the SDK.
    KelvinInit
    Public accessor class for the SDK.
    KelvinLocation
    This is a data object representing the location where a prediction was taken.
    KelvinWakefulBroadcastReceiver
    Abstract class that can be extended in order to receive Prediction objects from the SDK as they are produced.
    Prediction
    This is a data object representing a prediction made by the SDK.
    Temperature
    This is a data object representing a Temperature prediction made by the SDK.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OperatingMode
    Enum that defines the allowable modes of operation of the SDK.
